title: Defeat the Ruby Wizard
description:
This is it, the final battle. The Ruby Wizard was behind this all along!

Ruby Wizards are evil sorcerers hell bent on conquering every land they can reach.

This one is riding a giant Red Wolf. We must defeat them both using only one selector, otherwise they will get us.

Use the CSS attribute selector and strike all foes whose color starts with the letter 'r.

[attribute^=value]
